inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The TFS/Team Services service endpoint that specifies the identity used to upload the symbols.

inputs.name: externalAccessToken
inputs.label: External Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can create this token within your user settings in Raygun, just navigate to (https://app.raygun.io/user) and check the External Access Token section.

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: Api Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The API Key of your Raygun Application.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of your Application that this deployment is releasing. Should be the same as the version string you use in your Raygun error reports.

inputs.name: ownerName
inputs.label: Owner Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the person who is creating this deployment. Ideally should be a Raygun User.

inputs.name: emailAddress
inputs.label: Email Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: The email address of the person who is creating this deployment. Ideally should be a Raygun User's email address.

inputs.name: scmIdentifier
inputs.label: Scm Identifier
inputs.helpMarkDown: The identifier of the commit that this release was built from.

inputs.name: releaseNotes
inputs.label: Release Notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: The release notes for this deployment. Will be formatted as Markdown.

messages.ServerErrorUnauthorized: Registering deployment failed with error 'Unauthorized'. Please check the credentials used.
messages.ServerErrorNotFound: Registering deployment failed with error 'Not Found'. Please make sure the Raygun application '%s' exists.
